column4: can anyone tell me how to set up wifi from command line?  my network manager has stopped working
do you have a wlan0 in `sudo ifconfig -a`?
configuring from the commandline looks something like `sudo ifconfig wlan0 192.168.0.110` where 192.168.0.110 falls somewhere inside your local network.  But the output of ifconfig -a would help.
